alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 12:55PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM PST THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches lower elevations with 6 to 12 inches higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Coast Range, Burney Basin and Shasta County Mountains above 2500 feet including portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with travel delays, slick and snow-covered roads, and possible chain controls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels lowering to 2000 to 3000 feet Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
